name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Lufthansa
description: This is a repository of lufthansa APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Lufthansa
apis.description: Book your flights to Germany, Italy, UK or France online at attractive low fares. Fly via Frankfurt, Munich or Zurich - Lufthansa United States of America
